nodes.name: Get Procore Commitments

nodes.name: Match to Commitment
nodes.notes: Fuzzy match invoice to Procore commitment by vendor name + amount

nodes.name: Match Confidence Router
nodes.notes: Route by confidence: HIGH=auto-match, MEDIUM=flag for review, LOW=manual

nodes.name: Create Bill in QBO
nodes.notes: Create vendor bill in QuickBooks Online

nodes.name: Log in Notion
nodes.notes: Create Notion entry with match details
